text: Whaaaaahhhhh!!! This is a loving portrait of the artist’s oh so human son. What parent cannot relate' Darius Steward painted this watercolor in 2018, the same year he won the Cleveland Arts Prize, Emerging Artist Award. Steward studies the everyday lives of his subjects, sometimes composing his images from unusual points of view. This is part of a series that he did of children’s actions and expressions.
title: Crying Child
